When I copy some simplified Chinese character from another browser and paste it into Firefox's search bar or ImTranslator, this simplified Chinese character changes to its corresponding traditional style. It seems that Firefox can not correctly display some simplified Chinese characters. This would make huge number of Chinese users feel quite uncomfortable and have to give up Firefox.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: nebuladeep@gmail.com
